Their influences on adoption behavior, measured by the selection frequency of autonomous taxis in ten scenarios, are examined and interpreted. Results show that Cost Sensitivity and Behavioral Intention are the strongest positive predictors of adoption, while other latent constructs play more nuanced roles. The model demonstrates strong goodness-of-fit across multiple indices. Our findings offer empirical evidence to support policymaking, fare design, and public outreach strategies for scaling autonomous taxis deployments in real-world urban settings.

AI.tldr: 本研究利用中国武汉百度阿波罗自动驾驶出租车服务的实际用户调查数据，通过结构方程模型分析影响自动驾驶出租车采用行为的潜在心理构念，为政策制定、票价设计和公共推广策略提供实证依据。
AI.motivation: 现有文献多通过陈述偏好实验和假设场景研究自动驾驶出租车的用户接受度，但缺乏基于实际运营自动驾驶服务的用户行为调查，本研究旨在填补这一空白。
AI.method: 设计包含实际服务属性的真实调查，收集武汉百度阿波罗自动驾驶出租车实际用户的336份有效问卷，使用结构方程模型识别六个潜在心理构念（信任与政策支持、成本敏感性、性能、行为意向、生活方式、教育水平），并分析其对自动驾驶出租车采用行为（以十种场景下的选择频率衡量）的影响。
AI.result: 成本敏感性和行为意向是采用行为最强的正向预测因素，其他潜在构念发挥更细致的作用；模型在多个指标上表现出良好的拟合优度。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果为自动驾驶出租车在现实城市环境中的规模化部署提供了政策制定、票价设计和公共推广策略的实证支持。

title: Scaling Open-Ended Reasoning to Predict the Future
summary: High-stakes decision making involves reasoning under uncertainty about the future. In this work, we train language models to make predictions on open-ended forecasting questions. To scale up training data, we synthesize novel forecasting questions from global events reported in daily news, using a fully automated, careful curation recipe. We train the Qwen3 thinking models on our dataset, OpenForesight. To prevent leakage of future information during training and evaluation, we use an offline news corpus, both for data generation and retrieval in our forecasting system. Guided by a small validation set, we show the benefits of retrieval, and an improved reward function for reinforcement learning (RL). Once we obtain our final forecasting system, we perform held-out testing between May to August 2025. Our specialized model, OpenForecaster 8B, matches much larger proprietary models, with our training improving the accuracy, calibration, and consistency of predictions. We find calibration improvements from forecasting training generalize across popular benchmarks. We open-source all our models, code, and data to make research on language model forecasting broadly accessible.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种自动化方法从新闻中合成预测问题数据集OpenForesight，训练Qwen3模型得到OpenForecaster 8B，其在2025年5-8月的测试中预测准确性、校准性和一致性优于基础模型，可匹配更大规模专有模型，且校准改进可泛化至其他基准，同时开源所有资源。
AI.motivation: 高风险决策需在未来不确定性下推理，但现有语言模型预测研究缺乏大规模高质量训练数据，且需避免未来信息泄露以确保训练和评估的有效性。
AI.method: 通过自动化流程从日常新闻中合成新的预测问题数据集OpenForesight；使用该数据集训练Qwen3思维模型，引入检索机制和改进的强化学习奖励函数；在2025年5月至8月进行保留测试评估模型性能。
AI.result: 训练后的OpenForecaster 8B模型在预测准确性、校准性和一致性上均有提升，可匹配更大规模的专有模型；预测训练带来的校准改进可泛化到流行基准数据集。
AI.conclusion: 该研究证明了基于自动化合成新闻预测问题训练语言模型的有效性，所提出的OpenForecaster 8B模型性能优异且校准泛化能力强，开源资源将促进语言模型预测领域的广泛研究。

title: DTI-GP: Bayesian operations for drug-target interactions using deep kernel Gaussian processes
summary: Precise probabilistic information about drug-target interaction (DTI) predictions is vital for understanding limitations and boosting predictive performance. Gaussian processes (GP) offer a scalable framework to integrate state-of-the-art DTI representations and Bayesian inference, enabling novel operations, such as Bayesian classification with rejection, top-$K$ selection, and ranking. We propose a deep kernel learning-based GP architecture (DTI-GP), which incorporates a combined neural embedding module for chemical compounds and protein targets, and a GP module. The workflow continues with sampling from the predictive distribution to estimate a Bayesian precedence matrix, which is used in fast and accurate selection and ranking operations. DTI-GP outperforms state-of-the-art solutions, and it allows (1) the construction of a Bayesian accuracy-confidence enrichment score, (2) rejection schemes for improved enrichment, and (3) estimation and search for top-$K$ selections and ranking with high expected utility.

AI.tldr: 本文提出DTI-GP架构，结合深度核学习的高斯过程与神经嵌入模块，用于药物-靶点相互作用预测，实现贝叶斯分类、top-K选择和排序等操作并提升性能
AI.motivation: 药物-靶点相互作用（DTI）预测的精确概率信息对理解局限性和提升预测性能至关重要
AI.method: 提出基于深度核学习的高斯过程架构DTI-GP，包含化合物与蛋白质靶点的组合神经嵌入模块和高斯过程模块，通过采样预测分布估计贝叶斯优先级矩阵用于选择和排序
AI.result: DTI-GP优于现有解决方案，支持构建贝叶斯准确度-置信度富集分数、改进富集的拒绝方案、估计和搜索高预期效用的top-K选择与排序
AI.conclusion: DTI-GP为DTI预测提供了高效的贝叶斯框架，具备多种实用功能并提升预测性能

title: Unregularized Linear Convergence in Zero-Sum Game from Preference Feedback
summary: Aligning large language models (LLMs) with human preferences has proven effective for enhancing model capabilities, yet standard preference modeling using the Bradley-Terry model assumes transitivity, overlooking the inherent complexity of human population preferences. Nash learning from human feedback (NLHF) addresses this by framing non-transitive preferences as a two-player zero-sum game, where alignment reduces to finding the Nash equilibrium (NE). However, existing algorithms typically rely on regularization, incurring unavoidable bias when computing the duality gap in the original game. In this work, we provide the first convergence guarantee for Optimistic Multiplicative Weights Update ($\mathtt{OMWU}$) in NLHF, showing that it achieves last-iterate linear convergence after a burn-in phase whenever an NE with full support exists, with an instance-dependent linear convergence rate to the original NE, measured by duality gaps. Compared to prior results in Wei et al. (2020), we do not require the assumption of NE uniqueness. Our analysis identifies a novel marginal convergence behavior, where the probability of rarely played actions grows exponentially from exponentially small values, enabling exponentially better dependence on instance-dependent constants than prior results. Experiments corroborate the theoretical strengths of $\mathtt{OMWU}$ in both tabular and neural policy classes, demonstrating its potential for LLM applications.

AI.tldr: 本文针对大语言模型（LLMs）与人类偏好对齐中的非传递性偏好问题，提出使用乐观乘法权重更新（OMWU）算法，并首次给出其在纳什学习从人类反馈（NLHF）框架下的收敛保证，无需假设纳什均衡（NE）唯一性，且实验验证了该算法在表格和神经策略类中的优势。
AI.motivation: 标准偏好建模（如Bradley-Terry模型）假设偏好传递性，但人类群体偏好存在固有复杂性（非传递性）；现有NLHF算法依赖正则化，在计算原始游戏的对偶间隙时会产生不可避免的偏差。
AI.method: 采用乐观乘法权重更新（OMWU）算法，在NLHF框架下分析其收敛性，无需假设纳什均衡（NE）唯一性；识别出一种新的边际收敛行为，即很少被选择的动作的概率从指数小值呈指数增长。
AI.result: 当存在完全支持的NE时，OMWU算法在预热阶段后实现最后迭代的线性收敛，收敛速率依赖实例且通过对偶间隙衡量；相比Wei等人（2020）的结果，对实例依赖常数的依赖呈指数级改善；实验证实OMWU在表格和神经策略类中的理论优势。
AI.conclusion: OMWU算法在处理非传递性人类偏好对齐问题上具有显著优势，其收敛保证和边际收敛行为为LLM应用提供了有效方法，实验结果验证了其潜力。

title: Discovering Coordinated Joint Options via Inter-Agent Relative Dynamics
summary: Temporally extended actions improve the ability to explore and plan in single-agent settings. In multi-agent settings, the exponential growth of the joint state space with the number of agents makes coordinated behaviours even more valuable. Yet, this same exponential growth renders the design of multi-agent options particularly challenging. Existing multi-agent option discovery methods often sacrifice coordination by producing loosely coupled or fully independent behaviours. Toward addressing these limitations, we describe a novel approach for multi-agent option discovery. Specifically, we propose a joint-state abstraction that compresses the state space while preserving the information necessary to discover strongly coordinated behaviours. Our approach builds on the inductive bias that synchronisation over agent states provides a natural foundation for coordination in the absence of explicit objectives. We first approximate a fictitious state of maximal alignment with the team, the \textit{Fermat} state, and use it to define a measure of \textit{spreadness}, capturing team-level misalignment on each individual state dimension. Building on this representation, we then employ a neural graph Laplacian estimator to derive options that capture state synchronisation patterns between agents. We evaluate the resulting options across multiple scenarios in two multi-agent domains, showing that they yield stronger downstream coordination capabilities compared to alternative option discovery methods.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一种新的多智能体选项发现方法，通过联合状态抽象和神经图拉普拉斯估计器生成强协调行为，在多个场景中表现优于现有方法
AI.motivation: 多智能体环境中联合状态空间随智能体数量指数增长，现有多智能体选项发现方法常产生松散耦合或完全独立的行为，牺牲了协调性
AI.method: 提出联合状态抽象（包括近似Fermat状态以衡量状态维度上的团队级错位），并使用神经图拉普拉斯估计器推导捕捉智能体间状态同步模式的选项
AI.result: 在两个多智能体领域的多个场景中评估，结果显示所生成的选项比替代方法具有更强的下游协调能力
AI.conclusion: 该方法有效解决了多智能体选项发现中的协调问题，为多智能体系统的协调行为设计提供了新途径

title: AODDiff: Probabilistic Reconstruction of Aerosol Optical Depth via Diffusion-based Bayesian Inference
summary: High-quality reconstruction of Aerosol Optical Depth (AOD) fields is critical for Atmosphere monitoring, yet current models remain constrained by the scarcity of complete training data and a lack of uncertainty quantification.To address these limitations, we propose AODDiff, a probabilistic reconstruction framework based on diffusion-based Bayesian inference. By leveraging the learned spatiotemporal probability distribution of the AOD field as a generative prior, this framework can be flexibly adapted to various reconstruction tasks without requiring task-specific retraining. We first introduce a corruption-aware training strategy to learns a spatiotemporal AOD prior solely from naturally incomplete data. Subsequently, we employ a decoupled annealing posterior sampling strategy that enables the more effective and integration of heterogeneous observations as constraints to guide the generation process. We validate the proposed framework through extensive experiments on Reanalysis data. Results across downscaling and inpainting tasks confirm the efficacy and robustness of AODDiff, specifically demonstrating its advantage in maintaining high spatial spectral fidelity. Furthermore, as a generative model, AODDiff inherently enables uncertainty quantification via multiple sampling, offering critical confidence metrics for downstream applications.

AI.tldr: 本文提出AODDiff框架，基于扩散贝叶斯推理解决AOD场重建中的数据稀缺和不确定性量化问题，在降尺度和修复任务中表现出高效性和鲁棒性，并能提供不确定性量化。
AI.motivation: 当前AOD场重建模型受限于完整训练数据稀缺和缺乏不确定性量化，难以满足大气监测需求。
AI.method: 提出AODDiff概率重建框架，采用基于扩散的贝叶斯推理；通过 corruption-aware 训练策略从自然不完整数据中学习时空AOD先验；使用解耦退火后验采样策略整合异构观测作为约束引导生成过程。
AI.result: 在再分析数据上的实验表明，AODDiff在降尺度和修复任务中有效且鲁棒，能保持高空间光谱保真度；作为生成模型，通过多次采样可实现不确定性量化，为下游应用提供关键置信度指标。
AI.conclusion: AODDiff框架解决了AOD场重建中的关键问题，在相关任务中表现优异，并支持不确定性量化，具有重要应用价值。

title: Characterization of Transfer Using Multi-task Learning Curves
summary: Transfer effects manifest themselves both during training using a fixed data set and in inductive inference using accumulating data. We hypothesize that perturbing the data set by including more samples, instead of perturbing the model by gradient updates, provides a complementary and more fundamental characterization of transfer effects. To capture this phenomenon, we quantitatively model transfer effects using multi-task learning curves approximating the inductive performance over varying sample sizes. We describe an efficient method to approximate multi-task learning curves analogous to the Task Affinity Grouping method applied during training. We compare the statistical and computational approaches to transfer, which indicates considerably higher compute costs for the previous but better power and broader applicability. Evaluations are performed using a benchmark drug-target interaction data set. Our results show that learning curves can better capture the effects of multi-task learning and their multi-task extensions can delineate pairwise and contextual transfer effects in foundation models.

AI.tldr: 本文提出通过数据扰动而非模型扰动来表征迁移效应，使用多任务学习曲线量化建模并在药物-靶点相互作用数据集上验证其有效性
AI.motivation: 现有迁移效应研究多关注训练中的模型扰动（梯度更新），缺乏对数据扰动（增加样本）这一更基础表征方式的探索
AI.method: 采用多任务学习曲线近似不同样本量下的归纳性能，提出类似Task Affinity Grouping的高效近似方法，并比较统计与计算两种迁移方法
AI.result: 在药物-靶点相互作用基准数据集上，学习曲线能更好捕捉多任务学习效应，其多任务扩展可描绘基础模型中的成对和上下文迁移效应
AI.conclusion: 数据扰动下的多任务学习曲线是表征迁移效应的有效工具，相比传统计算方法具有更高的统计效力和更广的适用性

title: MSACL: Multi-Step Actor-Critic Learning with Lyapunov Certificates for Exponentially Stabilizing Control
summary: Achieving provable stability in model-free reinforcement learning (RL) remains a challenge, particularly in balancing exploration with rigorous safety. This article introduces MSACL, a framework that integrates exponential stability theory with maximum entropy RL through multi-step Lyapunov certificate learning. Unlike methods relying on complex reward engineering, MSACL utilizes off-policy multi-step data to learn Lyapunov certificates satisfying theoretical stability conditions. By introducing Exponential Stability Labels (ESL) and a $λ$-weighted aggregation mechanism, the framework effectively balances the bias-variance trade-off in multi-step learning. Policy optimization is guided by a stability-aware advantage function, ensuring the learned policy promotes rapid Lyapunov descent. We evaluate MSACL across six benchmarks, including stabilization and nonlinear tracking tasks, demonstrating its superiority over state-of-the-art Lyapunov-based RL algorithms. MSACL achieves exponential stability and rapid convergence under simple rewards, while exhibiting significant robustness to uncertainties and generalization to unseen trajectories. Sensitivity analysis establishes the multi-step horizon $n=20$ as a robust default across diverse systems. By linking Lyapunov theory with off-policy actor-critic frameworks, MSACL provides a foundation for verifiably safe learning-based control. Source code and benchmark environments will be made publicly available.

AI.tldr: 本文提出MSACL框架，通过多步李雅普诺夫证书学习将指数稳定性理论与最大熵强化学习结合，实现无模型RL的可证明稳定性，在六个基准任务上优于现有方法。
AI.motivation: 无模型强化学习（RL）中实现可证明的稳定性是一个挑战，尤其是在探索与严格安全性之间的平衡方面。
AI.method: 提出MSACL框架，整合指数稳定性理论与最大熵RL，通过多步李雅普诺夫证书学习；使用离策略多步数据学习满足理论稳定性条件的李雅普诺夫证书；引入指数稳定性标签（ESL）和λ加权聚合机制平衡多步学习中的偏差-方差权衡；通过稳定性感知优势函数引导策略优化以促进快速李雅普诺夫下降。
AI.result: 在六个基准任务（包括稳定化和非线性跟踪任务）上评估，MSACL优于最先进的基于李雅普诺夫的RL算法；实现指数稳定性和快速收敛（简单奖励下）；对不确定性表现出显著鲁棒性，并能泛化到未见过的轨迹；敏感性分析确定多步视野n=20是不同系统的稳健默认值。
AI.conclusion: MSACL通过将李雅普诺夫理论与离策略actor-critic框架联系起来，为可验证的安全基于学习的控制提供了基础；源代码和基准环境将公开可用。

title: Attribution-Guided Distillation of Matryoshka Sparse Autoencoders
summary: Sparse autoencoders (SAEs) aim to disentangle model activations into monosemantic, human-interpretable features. In practice, learned features are often redundant and vary across training runs and sparsity levels, which makes interpretations difficult to transfer and reuse. We introduce Distilled Matryoshka Sparse Autoencoders (DMSAEs), a training pipeline that distills a compact core of consistently useful features and reuses it to train new SAEs. DMSAEs run an iterative distillation cycle: train a Matryoshka SAE with a shared core, use gradient X activation to measure each feature's contribution to next-token loss in the most nested reconstruction, and keep only the smallest subset that explains a fixed fraction of the attribution. Only the core encoder weight vectors are transferred across cycles; the core decoder and all non-core latents are reinitialized each time. On Gemma-2-2B layer 12 residual stream activations, seven cycles of distillation (500M tokens, 65k width) yielded a distilled core of 197 features that were repeatedly selected. Training using this distilled core improves several SAEBench metrics and demonstrates that consistent sets of latent features can be transferred across sparsity levels

AI.tldr: 本文提出Distilled Matryoshka稀疏自动编码器（DMSAEs）训练流程，通过迭代蒸馏获得可跨稀疏度水平迁移的一致核心特征集，提升SAE性能。
AI.motivation: 稀疏自动编码器（SAEs）学习的特征常存在冗余且跨训练运行和稀疏度水平变化，导致解释难以迁移和复用。
AI.method: 引入DMSAEs训练流程：1）训练共享核心的Matryoshka SAE；2）用梯度×激活度衡量每个特征对最嵌套重构中next-token损失的贡献；3）保留解释固定比例归因的最小特征子集；4）仅核心编码器权重向量跨周期迁移，核心解码器和非核心潜变量每次重新初始化。
AI.result: 在Gemma-2-2B第12层残差流激活上，7次蒸馏周期（5亿token，65k宽度）得到197个重复选择的蒸馏核心特征；使用该核心训练提升多个SAEBench指标。
AI.conclusion: DMSAEs可获得一致的潜特征集，且能跨稀疏度水平迁移，为SAE特征的复用和解释性提升提供有效方法。

title: Efficiently Estimating Data Efficiency for Language Model Fine-tuning
summary: While large language models (LLMs) demonstrate reasonable zero-shot capability across many downstream tasks, fine-tuning is a common practice to improve their performance. However, a task's data efficiency--i.e., the number of fine-tuning examples needed to achieve a desired level of performance--is often unknown, resulting in costly cycles of incremental annotation and retraining. Indeed, we demonstrate across a curated set of 30 specialized tasks that performant LLMs may struggle zero-shot but can attain stronger performance after fine-tuning. This motivates the need for methods to predict a task's data efficiency without requiring incremental annotation. After introducing a concrete metric that quantifies a task's data efficiency, we propose using the gradient cosine similarity of low-confidence examples to predict data efficiency based on a small number of labeled samples. We validate our approach on a diverse set of tasks with varying data efficiencies, attaining 8.6% error in overall data efficiency prediction and typically eliminating hundreds of unnecessary annotations on each task. Our experiment results and implementation code are available on GitHub.

AI.tldr: 针对大语言模型微调中数据效率未知导致的高成本问题，提出基于低置信度样本梯度余弦相似度的预测方法，可在少量标注样本下准确预测任务数据效率，减少不必要标注。
AI.motivation: 大语言模型在下游任务中虽有零样本能力，但微调能提升性能；然而任务的数据效率（达到目标性能所需的微调样本数）常未知，导致增量标注和重训练的高成本循环；且高性能LLM在专业任务上零样本表现差但微调后可提升，因此需要无需增量标注即可预测数据效率的方法。
AI.method: 首先引入量化任务数据效率的具体指标，然后提出使用低置信度样本的梯度余弦相似度，基于少量标注样本预测任务的数据效率。
AI.result: 在多种数据效率不同的任务上验证方法，整体数据效率预测误差为8.6%，每个任务通常可减少数百次不必要的标注；实验结果和代码已开源至GitHub。
AI.conclusion: 该方法能有效预测任务的数据效率，减少不必要的标注成本，为LLM微调的数据标注提供优化方向。

title: Diffusion Language Models are Provably Optimal Parallel Samplers
summary: Diffusion language models (DLMs) have emerged as a promising alternative to autoregressive models for faster inference via parallel token generation. We provide a rigorous foundation for this advantage by formalizing a model of parallel sampling and showing that DLMs augmented with polynomial-length chain-of-thought (CoT) can simulate any parallel sampling algorithm using an optimal number of sequential steps. Consequently, whenever a target distribution can be generated using a small number of sequential steps, a DLM can be used to generate the distribution using the same number of optimal sequential steps. However, without the ability to modify previously revealed tokens, DLMs with CoT can still incur large intermediate footprints. We prove that enabling remasking (converting unmasked tokens to masks) or revision (converting unmasked tokens to other unmasked tokens) together with CoT further allows DLMs to simulate any parallel sampling algorithm with optimal space complexity. We further justify the advantage of revision by establishing a strict expressivity gap: DLMs with revision or remasking are strictly more expressive than those without. Our results not only provide a theoretical justification for the promise of DLMs as the most efficient parallel sampler, but also advocate for enabling revision in DLMs.

AI.tldr: 本文为扩散语言模型（DLMs）的并行推理优势提供了理论基础，证明了带思维链（CoT）的DLMs可模拟最优顺序步骤的并行采样算法，而加入重掩码或修订功能的DLMs能进一步优化空间复杂度并具有更强的表达能力
AI.motivation: 扩散语言模型（DLMs）作为自回归模型的替代方案，通过并行 token 生成实现更快推理，但缺乏对其优势的严格理论基础，且未解决中间足迹大的问题
AI.method: 形式化并行采样模型，证明带多项式长度思维链（CoT）的DLMs可模拟任意并行采样算法；进一步分析加入重掩码或修订功能的DLMs的空间复杂度和表达能力
AI.result: 1. 带CoT的DLMs可使用最优顺序步骤模拟目标分布生成；2. 加入重掩码或修订功能的DLMs可实现最优空间复杂度；3. 带修订或重掩码的DLMs比无此功能的DLMs表达能力更强
AI.conclusion: 本研究为DLMs作为最高效并行采样器提供了理论依据，并主张在DLMs中启用修订功能

title: Generative Classifiers Avoid Shortcut Solutions
summary: Discriminative approaches to classification often learn shortcuts that hold in-distribution but fail even under minor distribution shift. This failure mode stems from an overreliance on features that are spuriously correlated with the label. We show that generative classifiers, which use class-conditional generative models, can avoid this issue by modeling all features, both core and spurious, instead of mainly spurious ones. These generative classifiers are simple to train, avoiding the need for specialized augmentations, strong regularization, extra hyperparameters, or knowledge of the specific spurious correlations to avoid. We find that diffusion-based and autoregressive generative classifiers achieve state-of-the-art performance on five standard image and text distribution shift benchmarks and reduce the impact of spurious correlations in realistic applications, such as medical or satellite datasets. Finally, we carefully analyze a Gaussian toy setting to understand the inductive biases of generative classifiers, as well as the data properties that determine when generative classifiers outperform discriminative ones.

AI.tldr: 本文表明生成式分类器可避免判别式分类器依赖虚假相关特征的问题，在分布偏移基准上表现优异，并分析了其归纳偏置和适用数据特性
AI.motivation: 判别式分类方法常学习在分布内有效但在轻微分布偏移下失效的捷径，源于过度依赖与标签虚假相关的特征
AI.method: 使用类条件生成模型构建生成式分类器，无需专门增强、强正则化、额外超参数或特定虚假相关知识
AI.result: 基于扩散和自回归的生成式分类器在五个标准图像和文本分布偏移基准上达到最先进性能，减少了医疗或卫星数据集等实际应用中虚假相关的影响
AI.conclusion: 生成式分类器能有效缓解虚假相关问题，在分布偏移场景下优于判别式分类器；通过高斯玩具设置分析了其归纳偏置及决定其优于判别式分类器的数据特性

title: On the geometry and topology of representations: the manifolds of modular addition
summary: The Clock and Pizza interpretations, associated with architectures differing in either uniform or learnable attention, were introduced to argue that different architectural designs can yield distinct circuits for modular addition. In this work, we show that this is not the case, and that both uniform attention and trainable attention architectures implement the same algorithm via topologically and geometrically equivalent representations. Our methodology goes beyond the interpretation of individual neurons and weights. Instead, we identify all of the neurons corresponding to each learned representation and then study the collective group of neurons as one entity. This method reveals that each learned representation is a manifold that we can study utilizing tools from topology. Based on this insight, we can statistically analyze the learned representations across hundreds of circuits to demonstrate the similarity between learned modular addition circuits that arise naturally from common deep learning paradigms.

AI.tldr: 本文指出均匀注意力和可训练注意力架构通过拓扑和几何等价的表示实现相同的模块化加法算法，方法是将神经元集合视为实体并利用拓扑工具分析其流形特性，结果证明不同架构的学习电路具有相似性。
AI.motivation: 现有研究认为不同注意力架构（均匀或可训练）会产生不同的模块化加法电路，但本文旨在反驳这一观点，探索不同架构是否通过等价表示实现相同算法。
AI.method: 本文不局限于单个神经元和权重的解释，而是识别每个学习表示对应的所有神经元，将其视为一个实体，利用拓扑学工具分析这些神经元集合形成的流形，并通过统计方法分析数百个电路的学习表示。
AI.result: 研究发现均匀注意力和可训练注意力架构实现了相同的模块化加法算法，且它们的学习表示在拓扑和几何上是等价的；通过统计分析数百个电路，证明了常见深度学习范式自然产生的模块化加法电路之间存在相似性。
AI.conclusion: 不同注意力架构（均匀或可训练）通过拓扑和几何等价的表示实现相同的模块化加法算法，常见深度学习范式产生的模块化加法电路具有相似性。
